oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Intuitive versus scientific knowledge of cattle behaviour
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Raussi, Satu
Saarinen, Kati
Kauppinen, Tiina
Veissier, Isabelle
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The intuitive understanding of the behaviour of cattle by farmers and their practical knowledge of how cattle should be handled was studied and compared with knowledge from animal behaviour science.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Raussi, Satu; Saarinen, Kati; Kauppinen, Tiina and Veissier, Isabelle (2011) Intuitive versus scientific knowledge of cattle behaviour. Paper at: 23rd Nordic symposium of the ISAE, Tartu, Estonia, January 19-21, 2011.
